trans-unit.source: Contains a collection of bindings and <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule"></xref> objects that are used to validate an object.
trans-unit.target: Contém uma coleção de enlaces e <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule"> </xref> objetos que são utilizados para validar um objeto.

trans-unit.source: A BindingGroup creates a relationship between multiple bindings, which can be validated and updated together.
trans-unit.target: Um BindingGroup cria uma relação entre vários enlaces, que pode ser validado e atualizados em conjunto.

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose that an application prompts the user to enter an address.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, suponha que uma aplicação pede ao utilizador para introduzir um endereço.

trans-unit.source: The application then populates an object of type `Address`, which has the properties, `Street`, `City`, `ZipCode`, and `Country`, with the values that the user provided.
trans-unit.target: A aplicação, em seguida, preenche um objeto do tipo `Address`, que tem as propriedades, `Street`, `City`, `ZipCode`, e `Country`, com os valores que o utilizador forneceu.

trans-unit.source: The application has a panel that contains four <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> controls, each of which is data bound to one of the object’s properties.
trans-unit.target: A aplicação tem um painel que contém quatro <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>controlos, cada um dos quais é os dados vinculados a uma das propriedades do objeto.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: You can use a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule> in a BindingGroup to validate the `Address` object.
trans-unit.target: Pode utilizar um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule>num BindingGroup para validar o `Address` objeto.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule>

trans-unit.source: If the bindings participate in the same BindingGroup, you can ensure that the zip-code is valid for the country of the address.
trans-unit.target: Se os enlaces de participam no BindingGroup a mesma, pode certificar-se de que o código de zip é válido para o país/região do endereço.

trans-unit.source: You set the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.BindingGroup%2A> property on <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> or <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement>.
trans-unit.target: Definir a <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.BindingGroup%2A>propriedade <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>ou <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement>.</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.BindingGroup%2A>

trans-unit.source: Child elements inherit the BindingGroup from their parent elements, just as with any other inheritable property.
trans-unit.target: Elementos subordinados herdam o BindingGroup os respetivos elementos principais, basta tal como acontece com quaisquer outras propriedade herdável.

trans-unit.source: A binding on a descendent element is added to a BindingGroup if one of the following situations occurs: - The binding's source and the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.DataContext%2A> of the element that has the BindingGroup are the same object and the <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingBase.BindingGroupName%2A> property is not set.
trans-unit.target: Um enlace num elemento descendente é adicionado a um BindingGroup se ocorrer uma das seguintes situações:-origem o enlace e a <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.DataContext%2A>do elemento que tenha o BindingGroup são o mesmo objeto e o <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingBase.BindingGroupName%2A>propriedade não está definida.</xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingBase.BindingGroupName%2A> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.DataContext%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingBase.BindingGroupName%2A> property of the binding is equal to the <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.Name%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.BindingGroup%2A> and they are not explicitly set to `null`.
trans-unit.target: -O <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingBase.BindingGroupName%2A>é igual a propriedade de enlace de <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.Name%2A>do <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.BindingGroup%2A>e não são explicitamente definidas como `null`.</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.BindingGroup%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.Name%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingBase.BindingGroupName%2A>

trans-unit.source: In the example of the address, suppose that the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.DataContext%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel> is set to the object of type `Address`.
trans-unit.target: No exemplo do endereço, suponha que o <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.DataContext%2A>do <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel>está definido para o objeto do tipo `Address`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.DataContext%2A>

trans-unit.source: The binding for each <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> is added to the BindingGroup of the panel.
trans-unit.target: O enlace para cada <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>é adicionado à BindingGroup do painel.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: You add <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule> objects to a BindingGroup.
trans-unit.target: Adicionar <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule>objetos a um BindingGroup.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule>

trans-unit.source: The BindingGroup is passed as the first parameter of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule.Validate%2A> method when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule> runs.
trans-unit.target: O BindingGroup é transmitida como primeiro parâmetro do <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule.Validate%2A>método quando o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule>é executado.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule.Validate%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.TryGetValue%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.GetValue%28System.Object%2CSystem.String%29> method on that BindingGroup to get the proposed values of the object, and the <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.Items%2A> property to get the sources of the bindings.
trans-unit.target: Pode utilizar o <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.TryGetValue%2A>ou <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.GetValue%28System.Object%2CSystem.String%29>método em que BindingGroup para obter os valores propostos de objeto e o <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.Items%2A>propriedade obter as origens dos enlaces.</xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.Items%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.GetValue%28System.Object%2CSystem.String%29> </xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.TryGetValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: A BindingGroup updates the sources of the binding at the same time instead of each binding being updated separately.
trans-unit.target: Um BindingGroup atualiza as origens do enlace ao mesmo tempo, em vez de cada enlace que está a ser atualizado em separado.

trans-unit.source: When you call one of the methods to validate the data (<xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.ValidateWithoutUpdate%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.UpdateSources%2A>, or <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.CommitEdit%2A>), the binding for each <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> in the example is validated and potentially updated.
trans-unit.target: Quando chamar um dos métodos para validar os dados (<xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.ValidateWithoutUpdate%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.UpdateSources%2A>, ou <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.CommitEdit%2A>), o enlace para cada <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>no exemplo é validado e potencialmente atualizado.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.CommitEdit%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.UpdateSources%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.ValidateWithoutUpdate%2A>

trans-unit.source: When a binding is part of a BindingGroup, the source of the binding is not updated until you call <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.UpdateSources%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.CommitEdit%2A> on the BindingGroup, unless you explicitly set the <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.UpdateSourceTrigger%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Quando um enlace faz parte de um BindingGroup, a origem do enlace não for atualizada até chamar <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.UpdateSources%2A>ou <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.CommitEdit%2A>no BindingGroup, a menos que defina explicitamente a <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.UpdateSourceTrigger%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.UpdateSourceTrigger%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.CommitEdit%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.UpdateSources%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Begins an edit transaction on the sources in the <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Começa uma transação de edição nas origens do <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: If the sources in the <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup> support discarding pending changes, you can call BeginEdit to begin the edit transaction, call <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.CommitEdit%2A> to save the pending changes, call <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.CancelEdit%2A> to discard the pending changes.
trans-unit.target: Se as origens do <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup>suportar rejeitar as alterações pendentes, pode chamar BeginEdit para iniciar a transação de edição, chamar <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.CommitEdit%2A>para guardar as alterações pendentes, chame <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.CancelEdit%2A>para rejeitar as alterações pendentes.</xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.CancelEdit%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.CommitEdit%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup>

trans-unit.source: For each object in <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.Items%2A> that implements <xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableObject>, BeginEdit calls <xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableObject.BeginEdit%2A?displayProperty=fullName>
trans-unit.target: Para cada objeto no <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.Items%2A>que implementa <xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableObject>, chamadas de BeginEdit <xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableObject.BeginEdit%2A?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableObject.BeginEdit%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableObject> </xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.Items%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression"></xref> objects that contains information for each Binding in the <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma coleção de <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression"> </xref> objetos que contém informações para cada enlace no <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression> belongs to a <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup> if one of the following cases occurs: - The binding's source and the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.DataContext%2A> of the element that has the <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup> are the same object and the <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingBase.BindingGroupName%2A> is not set.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression>pertence a um <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup>se ocorrer uma das seguintes casos:-origem o enlace e a <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.DataContext%2A>do elemento que tenha o <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup>são o mesmo objeto e o <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingBase.BindingGroupName%2A>não está definido.</xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingBase.BindingGroupName%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.DataContext%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup> </xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingBase.BindingGroupName%2A> property of the binding and the <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.Name%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup> are set to the same non-null value and the <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup> belongs to a parent element of the binding's target element.
trans-unit.target: -O <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingBase.BindingGroupName%2A>propriedade do enlace e a <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.Name%2A>do <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup>estão definidas para o mesmo valor não nulo e o <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup>pertence a um elemento principal do elemento de destino do enlace.</xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup> </xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup> </xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.Name%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingBase.BindingGroupName%2A>

trans-unit.source: - You add a <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression> to BindingExpressions.
trans-unit.target: -Adicionar uma <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression>para BindingExpressions.</xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression>

trans-unit.source: A collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression"></xref> objects that contains information for each binding in the <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Uma coleção de <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression"> </xref> objetos que contém informações para cada enlace no <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Ends the edit transaction and discards the pending changes.
trans-unit.target: Termine a transação de edição e elimina as alterações pendentes.

trans-unit.source: This method causes the sources to discard the pending changes, if a source object is capable of doing so and end the edit transaction.
trans-unit.target: Este método faz com que as origens rejeitar as alterações pendentes, se um objeto de origem é capaz de fazê-lo e termine a transação de edição.

trans-unit.source: Then the method updates the target properties with the saved source values.
trans-unit.target: Em seguida, o método atualiza as propriedades de destino com os valores de origem guardado.

trans-unit.source: For each object in <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.Items%2A> that implements <xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableObject>, CancelEdit calls <xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableObject.CancelEdit%2A?displayProperty=fullName>
trans-unit.target: Para cada objeto no <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.Items%2A>que implementa <xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableObject>, chamadas de CancelEdit <xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableObject.CancelEdit%2A?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableObject.CancelEdit%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableObject> </xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.Items%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets whether each source in the binding can discard pending changes and restore the original values.
trans-unit.target: Obtém se cada origem no enlace pode rejeitar as alterações pendentes e restaurar os valores originais.

trans-unit.source: A source can discard pending changes if it implements <xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableObject>.
trans-unit.target: Uma origem pode rejeitar as alterações pendentes se implementa <xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableObject>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableObject>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if each source in the binding can discard pending changes and restore the original values; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se cada origem no enlace pode rejeitar as alterações pendentes e restaurar os valores originais; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Runs all the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule"></xref> objects and updates the binding sources if all validation rules succeed.
trans-unit.target: Executa todos os o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule"> </xref> objetos e atualiza as origens de enlace se todas as regras de validação com êxito.

trans-unit.source: If every <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule> succeeds, this method causes the sources to commit the pending changes and end the edit transaction, if a source object is capable of doing so.
trans-unit.target: Se cada <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule>for bem sucedida, as causas deste método origens para consolidar as alterações pendentes e termine a transação de edição, se uma origem de objeto é capaz de processo.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule>

trans-unit.source: For each object in <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.Items%2A> that implements <xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableObject>, CommitEdit calls <xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableObject.EndEdit%2A?displayProperty=fullName>
trans-unit.target: Para cada objeto no <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.Items%2A>que implementa <xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableObject>, chamadas de CommitEdit <xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableObject.EndEdit%2A?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableObject.EndEdit%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableObject> </xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.Items%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if every <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule"></xref> succeeds and the values are committed to the sources; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se cada <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule"> </xref> for bem sucedida e os valores são consolidar as origens; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns the proposed value for the specified property and item.
trans-unit.target: Devolve o valor proposto para o item e a propriedade especificada.

trans-unit.source: Use this method in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule.Validate%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to get the value to be committed to the source.
trans-unit.target: Utilize este método no <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule.Validate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método para obter o valor para ser submetido para a origem.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule.Validate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The type of the return value depends on the stage at which the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule> occurs.
trans-unit.target: O tipo de valor de retorno depende a fase em que o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule>ocorre.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule>

trans-unit.source: For example, if a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> is data bound to a property of type integer and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule> that calls GetValue has its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule.ValidationStep%2A> set to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationStep>, the method returns a string.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>estão vinculado a dados para uma propriedade do tipo número inteiro e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule>que chamadas GetValue tem respetivo <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule.ValidationStep%2A>definido como <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationStep>, o método devolve uma cadeia.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationStep> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule.ValidationStep%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule> has its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule.ValidationStep%2A> set to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationStep>, the method returns whatever type that is returned by the binding's converter.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule>tem respetivo <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule.ValidationStep%2A>definido como <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationStep>, o método devolve qualquer tipo que é devolvido pelo conversor o enlace.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationStep> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule.ValidationStep%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule>

trans-unit.source: In this example, GetValue usually returns an integer.
trans-unit.target: Neste exemplo, GetValue normalmente devolve um número inteiro.

trans-unit.source: The object that contains the specified property.
trans-unit.target: O objeto que contém a propriedade especificada.

trans-unit.source: The property whose proposed value to get.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade cujo valor proposto obter.

trans-unit.source: The proposed property value.
trans-unit.target: O valor da propriedade propostas.

trans-unit.source: There is not a binding for the specified item and property.
trans-unit.target: Não é um enlace para o item especificado e a propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The value of the specified property is not available, due to a conversion error or because an earlier validation rule failed.
trans-unit.target: O valor da propriedade especificada não está disponível, devido a um erro de conversão ou devido a falha de uma regra de validação anterior.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup"></xref> has a failed validation rule.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup"> </xref> tem uma regra de validação falhada.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup"></xref> has a failed validation rule; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup"> </xref> tem uma regra de validação falhada; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup"></xref> contains a proposed value that has not been written to the source.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup"> </xref> contém um valor proposto e que não foi escrito para a origem.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup"></xref> contains a proposed value that has not been written to the source; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup"> </xref> contém um valor proposto e que não foi escrito para a origem; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the sources that are used by the Binding objects in the <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém as origens que são utilizadas pelos objetos de enlace no <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Each object that is used as a source is added into the Items property once, even if the object is used as the source for multiple bindings.
trans-unit.target: Cada objeto que é utilizado como uma origem é adicionado uma vez, para a propriedade de itens, mesmo se o objeto é utilizado como origem para vários enlaces.

trans-unit.source: Often, there is just one item in Items, which is the object that is the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.DataContext%2A> of the element that uses the <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup>.
trans-unit.target: Muitas vezes, não há apenas um item de itens, que é o objeto que é a <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.DataContext%2A>do elemento que utiliza o <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup>.</xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.DataContext%2A>

trans-unit.source: It is possible for a <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup> to have multiple sources, however.
trans-unit.target: É possível que um <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup>ter várias origens, no entanto.</xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup>

trans-unit.source: For example, if Binding objects share the same <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingBase.BindingGroupName%2A> but use different source objects, each object that is used as a source is in Items.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se a objetos de enlace partilham o mesmo <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingBase.BindingGroupName%2A>mas utilizar objetos de origem diferente, cada objeto que é utilizado como uma origem de itens.</xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingBase.BindingGroupName%2A>

trans-unit.source: There can also be multiple objects in Items if the path of a Binding resolves to a nested property of the source.
trans-unit.target: Também pode haver vários objetos nos itens se o caminho de um enlace é convertido numa propriedade aninhada da origem.

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> control's binding is a part of a <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup> and its <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.DataContext%2A> is a `Customer` object, which has a property of type `Address`.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, suponha que um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>enlace do controlo é uma parte de um <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup>e a respetiva <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.DataContext%2A>é um `Customer` objeto, que tem uma propriedade do tipo `Address`.</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.DataContext%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.Path%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding> is the `Address.ZipCode` property, the `Address` is added to the Items property.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.Path%2A>do <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding>é o `Address.ZipCode` propriedade, o `Address` é adicionado à propriedade itens.</xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding> </xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.Path%2A>

trans-unit.source: The sources that are used by the Binding objects in the <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: As origens que são utilizadas pelos objetos de enlace no <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name that identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup"></xref>, which can be used to include and exclude Binding objects in the <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o nome que identifique o <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup"> </xref>, que podem ser utilizadas para incluir e excluir objetos de enlace no <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: If Name is `null`, bindings that have a source that is the same object as the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.DataContext%2A> of the element that has the <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup> participate in the <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup>.
trans-unit.target: Se o nome é `null`, enlaces que tem uma origem que é o mesmo objeto como <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.DataContext%2A>do elemento que tenha a <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup>participar no <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup>.</xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup> </xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.DataContext%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can include bindings that have a source that is different from the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.DataContext%2A> of the parent element that has the <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup> by setting Name of the <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup> and the <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingBase.BindingGroupName%2A> property of a binding to the same value.
trans-unit.target: Pode incluir enlaces que tem uma origem que é diferente do <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.DataContext%2A>do elemento principal que tenha o <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup>ao definir o nome do <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup>e o <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingBase.BindingGroupName%2A>propriedade de um enlace para o mesmo valor.</xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingBase.BindingGroupName%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup> </xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.DataContext%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can exclude bindings that have the same source as <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.DataContext%2A> of the parent element that has the <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup> by setting Name of the <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup> and the <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingBase.BindingGroupName%2A> property of a binding to different values.
trans-unit.target: Pode excluir enlaces que tenham a mesma origem como <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.DataContext%2A>do elemento principal que tenha o <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup>ao definir o nome do <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup>e o <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingBase.BindingGroupName%2A>propriedade de um enlace para diferentes valores.</xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingBase.BindingGroupName%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup> </xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.DataContext%2A>

trans-unit.source: The name that identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O nome que identifique o <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets whether the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.Error?displayProperty=fullName> event occurs when the state of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule"></xref> changes.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define se a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.Error?displayProperty=fullName> evento ocorre quando o estado de um <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule"> </xref> alterações.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.Error?displayProperty=fullName> attached event occurs on the element that has the <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.Error?displayProperty=fullName>evento anexado ocorre no elemento que tenha <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup>.</xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.Error?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.Error?displayProperty=fullName> event occurs when the state of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule"></xref> changes; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.Error?displayProperty=fullName> evento ocorre quando o estado de um <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule"> </xref> alterações; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the object that this <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup"></xref> is assigned to.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o objeto que isto <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup"> </xref> está atribuída.

trans-unit.source: The object that this <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup"></xref> is assigned to.
trans-unit.target: O objeto que este <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup"> </xref> está atribuída.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup"></xref> reuses target values that have not been committed to the source.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup"> </xref> reutiliza valores que não foram confirmados para a origem de destino.

trans-unit.source: A proposed value is a value that has been changed on the target of a binding, but has not been committed to the source.
trans-unit.target: Um valor proposto é um valor que foi alterado no destino de um vínculo, mas não foi consolidado a origem.

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose that there is a two-way binding on a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> and the <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.UpdateSourceTrigger%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Data.UpdateSourceTrigger>.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, suponha que há um vínculo bidirecional numa <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>e a <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.UpdateSourceTrigger%2A>propriedade está definida como <xref:System.Windows.Data.UpdateSourceTrigger>.</xref:System.Windows.Data.UpdateSourceTrigger> </xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.UpdateSourceTrigger%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: If the user changes the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>, the proposed value is the value that is in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> before it is committed to source.
trans-unit.target: Se o utilizador altera o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>, o valor proposto é o valor que está a ser o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>antes de consolidar a origem.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: When SharesProposedValues is `true`, the <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup> uses the proposed value when one binding leaves the BindingGroup and another Binding with the same source joins the BindingGroup.
trans-unit.target: Quando é SharesProposedValues `true`, a <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup>utiliza o valor proposto quando um enlace deixa o BindingGroup e outro enlace com a mesma origem associa o BindingGroup.</xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup>

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose that an application enables a user to edit multiple fields and update the source object by clicking a button.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, suponha que uma aplicação permite que um utilizador editar vários campos e atualize o objeto de origem ao clicar num botão.

trans-unit.source: When a field is not being edited, the application displays it in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock>.
trans-unit.target: Quando um campo não está a ser editado, a aplicação apresenta-o no <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock>

trans-unit.source: When the user begins to edit a field, the application replaces the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock> with a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: Quando o utilizador começa a editar um campo, a aplicação substitui o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock>com <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock>

trans-unit.source: When the user finishes editing that field, the application replaces the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> with a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock>.
trans-unit.target: Quando o utilizador termina a edição esse campo, a aplicação substitui o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>com <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: Because the source is not updated until the user clicks the button, there must be a way for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock> to display the proposed value.
trans-unit.target: Porque a origem não for atualizada até que o utilizador clica no botão, tem de haver uma forma do <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock>para apresentar o valor proposto.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock>

trans-unit.source: By setting SharesProposedValues to `true`, the application will display the user's changes to a field even when the source has not been updated.
trans-unit.target: Definindo SharesProposedValues `true`, a aplicação irá apresentar alterações do utilizador a um campo, mesmo quando não tiver sido atualizada a origem.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup"></xref> reuses target values that have not been committed to the source; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup"> </xref> reutiliza valores que não foram consolidadas para a origem; caso contrário, de destino <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Attempts to get the proposed value for the specified property and item.
trans-unit.target: A tentar obter o valor proposto para o item e a propriedade especificada.

trans-unit.source: TryGetValue returns `false` if there is not a binding for the specified item and property or if the value of the specified property is not available, due to a conversion error or because an earlier validation rule failed.
trans-unit.target: Devolve TryGetValue `false` se não houver um enlace para o item especificado e a propriedade ou se o valor da propriedade especificada não está disponível, devido a um erro de conversão ou devido a falha de uma regra de validação anterior.

trans-unit.source: Use this method in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule.Validate%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to get the value to be committed to the source.
trans-unit.target: Utilize este método no <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule.Validate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método para obter o valor para ser submetido para a origem.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule.Validate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The type `value` depends on the stage at which the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule> occurs.
trans-unit.target: O tipo `value` depende a fase em que o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule>ocorre.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule>

trans-unit.source: For example, if a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> is data bound to a property of type integer, `value` is a string if the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule> that calls TryGetValue has its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule.ValidationStep%2A> set to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationStep>.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>dados vinculado a uma propriedade do tipo número inteiro, `value` é uma cadeia, se a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule>que as chamadas TryGetValue tem respetivo <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule.ValidationStep%2A>definido como <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationStep>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationStep> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule.ValidationStep%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule> has its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule.ValidationStep%2A> set to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationStep>, the type of `value` is whatever type that is returned by the binding's converter.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule>tem respetivo <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule.ValidationStep%2A>definido como <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationStep>, o tipo de `value` qualquer tipo que é devolvido pelo conversor o enlace.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationStep> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule.ValidationStep%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule>

trans-unit.source: In this example, `value` is usually an integer.
trans-unit.target: Neste exemplo, `value` é, normalmente, um número inteiro.

trans-unit.source: The object that contains the specified property.
trans-unit.target: O objeto que contém a propriedade especificada.

trans-unit.source: The property whose proposed value to get.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade cujo valor proposto obter.

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, contains an object that represents the proposed property value.
trans-unit.target: Quando este método devolve, contém um objecto que representa o valor da propriedade propostas.

trans-unit.source: This parameter is passed uninitialized.
trans-unit.target: Este parâmetro é transmitido não inicializado.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if value is the proposed value for the specified property; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o valor for o valor proposto para a propriedade especificada; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Runs the converter on the binding and the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule"></xref> objects that have the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule.ValidationStep*> property set to <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ValidationStep"></xref>, <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ValidationStep"></xref>, or <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ValidationStep"></xref> and saves the values of the targets to the source objects if all the validation rules succeed.
trans-unit.target: Executa o conversor no enlace e a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule"> </xref> objetos que têm o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule.ValidationStep*>propriedade definida como <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ValidationStep"> </xref>, <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ValidationStep"> </xref>, ou <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ValidationStep"> </xref> e guarda os valores dos destinos para os objetos de origem se todas as regras de validação com êxito.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule.ValidationStep*>

trans-unit.source: This method updates the source if every <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule> succeeds, but it does not cause the sources to commit the pending changes and end the edit transaction.
trans-unit.target: Este método atualiza a origem, se cada <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule>for bem sucedida, mas não irá causar origens consolidar as alterações pendentes e termine a transação de edição.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule>

trans-unit.source: That is, if the source object implements <xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableObject>.
trans-unit.target: Ou seja, se o objeto de origem implementa <xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableObject>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableObject>

trans-unit.source: Calling this method does not cause <xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableObject.EndEdit%2A> to be called.
trans-unit.target: Chamar este método não irá causar <xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableObject.EndEdit%2A>ser chamado.</xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableObject.EndEdit%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.CommitEdit%2A> method to have the sources commit the pending changes.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.CommitEdit%2A>método para que as origens de consolidar as alterações pendentes.</xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.CommitEdit%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if all validation rules succeed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se todas as regras de validação for bem-sucedida; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to include the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.NotifyDataErrorValidationRule"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se deve incluir o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.NotifyDataErrorValidationRule"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When ValidatesOnNotifyDataError is `true`, the binding checks for and reports errors that are raised by a data source that implements <xref:System.ComponentModel.INotifyDataErrorInfo>.
trans-unit.target: Quando é ValidatesOnNotifyDataError `true`, o enlace verifica e relatórios de erros que são gerados por uma origem de dados que implemente <xref:System.ComponentModel.INotifyDataErrorInfo>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.INotifyDataErrorInfo>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to include the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.NotifyDataErrorValidationRule"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para incluir o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.NotifyDataErrorValidationRule"> </xref>; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Runs the converter on the binding and the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule"></xref> objects that have the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule.ValidationStep*> property set to <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ValidationStep"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ValidationStep"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Executa o conversor no enlace e a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule"> </xref> objetos que têm o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule.ValidationStep*>propriedade definida como <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ValidationStep"> </xref> ou <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ValidationStep"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule.ValidationStep*>

trans-unit.source: The sources are not updated when you call this method.
trans-unit.target: As origens não são atualizadas ao chamar este método.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the validation rules succeed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se as regras de validação for bem-sucedida; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ValidationError"></xref> objects that caused the <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup"></xref> to be invalid.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma coleção de <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ValidationError"> </xref> objetos que causou o <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup"> </xref> ser inválido.

trans-unit.source: A collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ValidationError"></xref> objects that caused <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup"></xref> to be invalid.
trans-unit.target: Uma coleção de <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ValidationError"> </xref> objetos que causou <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup"> </xref> ser inválido.

trans-unit.source: The value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if there are no errors.
trans-unit.target: O valor é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> se existirem erros.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule"></xref> objects that validate the source objects in the <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma coleção de <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule"> </xref> objetos validar os objetos de origem no <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule> is added to a <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup>, the <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup> is passed in as the first parameter of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule.Validate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Quando um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule>é adicionada a um <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup>, a <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup>seja transmitido como primeiro parâmetro do <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule.Validate%2A>método.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule.Validate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup> </xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule>

trans-unit.source: You can get the proposed values of the object by using the <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.TryGetValue%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.GetValue%28System.Object%2CSystem.String%29> method.
trans-unit.target: Pode obter os valores propostos de objeto utilizando o <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.TryGetValue%2A>ou <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.GetValue%28System.Object%2CSystem.String%29>método.</xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.GetValue%28System.Object%2CSystem.String%29> </xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.TryGetValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can get the objects that are the sources of the bindings from the <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.Items%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Pode obter os objetos que estão as origens dos enlaces do <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.Items%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.Items%2A>

trans-unit.source: A collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule"></xref> objects that validate the source objects in the <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Uma coleção de <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule"> </xref> objetos validar os objetos de origem no <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup"> </xref>.
